name: My Last Adventure
description:
This is our entry for the Spooky2D 2022 Game Jam that ran from October 21st to October 23rd 2022. The theme was what's hiding in the dark?

Play as a ghost who must hide in the dark not to spook the guards and lose the game while still finding all the items on its adventure.

For some godot reason, the html player does not work nicely with audio + transitions. For this reason, for superior audio experience, we suggest that you download the executables.

Gameplay

The player can move either with WASD or the arrows. When the scared-meter is full, it's game over (the player loses). Once the player clears the level (i.e. finds all the items), they can move to the next one. 

Development Team

cat.astro and thoozee.

Tools

We used Godot 3.5, Blender 3.3, Krita and GIMP 2.10.

Credits

For the locale executables, we must credit Gonkee for the fog shader for Godot 3.
